name: Stressed Out
description:
Had a tough day? Jump in, sit back and relax. Or grab a weapon and smash everthing. Had enough smashing? Visit the arena for some PvE action.

Stressed Out is an open world sandbox built for VR with fully destructible environment.

For any feedback/questions contact me at https://mastodon.social/@NecdetYavas or https://twitter.com/Nedstreme

Features:

  • Full Body Presence (no floating hands)
  • Destructible Open World
  • 8 Melee Weapons
  • 4 Guns
  • Realistic Destruction Physics
  • 3 Areas to Destroy (working on 4th)
  • PvE Arena (coming soon)
  • Multiplayer (trying to figure it out)

Movement:

  • Smooth / Snap Turn
  • Continuous Movement
  • Jump
  • Double Jump!
  • Teleport (not implemented yet)

Graphics:

  • Forward Rendering
  • Real Time Lighting
  • Dynamic shadows
  • Variable Rate Shading (VRS)
  • Fixed Foveated Rendering
  • Contrast Adaptive Shading

Anti Aliasing and Sharpening

  • FXAA, TAA, MSAA, TSR
  • DLSS 3.1 with NIS sharpening
  • FSR 2.2 with CAS sharpening


I hope you enjoy your time!
